metadata.title: CVE-2018-15671 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. Excessive stack consumption has been detected in the function H5P__get_cb() in H5Pint.c during an attempted parse of a crafted HDF file. This results in denial of service.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
